title: Sam Altman defends AI resource usage: Water concerns 'fake,' and 'humans use energy too'
summary_full: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman defended the resource use of AI on Friday, arguing that water concerns were "fake" and comparing it to human energy use.
summary_public: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman defended the resource use of AI on Friday, arguing that water concerns were "fake" and comparing it to human energy use.
